entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries near the Cariboo mountains. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries near the Cariboo mountains this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
